definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The intruders shot up the town.
sentences.chinese: 入侵者在镇上到处放枪制造恐怖。

sentences.english: The frontier guards together with the militiamen drove out the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 边防战士和民兵一起把入侵者赶了出去。

sentences.english: You can be certain that potential intruders learn of those security holes quickly.
sentences.chinese: 可以肯定，潜在的入侵者会很快了解那些安全性漏洞。

sentences.english: An 81-year-old would-be victim chased the intruder off with a gun.
sentences.chinese: 一位差点成为受害者的81岁老太用枪赶跑了入侵者。

sentences.english: The villagers are powerless against the armed invaders.
sentences.chinese: 这些村民门无力反抗武装入侵者。

sentences.english: The Mon Calamari and the Quarren joined together to fight back against the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 蒙卡拉马里人与夸润人联手回击了入侵者。

sentences.english: Fighting tooth and nail, the peasants refused to go down before the invaders.
sentences.chinese: 农民们不甘为入侵者所征服而作殊死的斗争。

sentences.english: Playa Larga was one of the beaches where the invaders disembarked on April 1961.
sentences.chinese: 拉尔卡海滩是1961年入侵者登陆的海滩之一。

sentences.english: The invader de-vastated the whole town.
sentences.chinese: 入侵者蹂躏了整个城镇。
入侵者肆意破坏博物馆。

sentences.english: A6E "intruders" carrier-based air defenses of paper drawings of the model 16, note 2.
sentences.chinese: “入侵者”舰载攻击机纸模型图纸16张，说明2张。

sentences.english: The war situation was inverted and the invaders were defeated.
sentences.chinese: 战局倒转了，入侵者被击退。

sentences.english: The Russians retreated before the invaders, tempting them to stretch their supply lines.
sentences.chinese: 俄国人在入侵者之前撤退，引诱他们延长补给线。

sentences.english: Responses are then returned to the intruder site.
sentences.chinese: 然后响应被返回到入侵者站点。

sentences.english: In theory at least, RIM should have no problem fending off the interloper.
sentences.chinese: 至少在理论上，RIM应该能够抵挡住这个入侵者。
